ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: A great class that examines the linkages between literature,"visual culture" and the representation of the black female body. Were a student interested in visual culture and looking at a wide variety of texts that would rarely be put in dialogue with one another I would unquestionably recommend this course.

It's fantastic. I suppose it might vary if there were different artists visiting, but it's a really wonderful course. It's not a survey at all, but it provokes very useful discussion and is an excellent model for how to think interdisciplinarily.It's a lot of reading/writing, sometimes too much of the former, but all of the assigned works are terrific.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Gave me a much better understanding of 20th/21st century artists, and pushed me to really think hard and on some of my conceptions of music for the dissertation.
It introduced me to new creative works and new questions. It enabled me to engage my dissertation project in new ways.
